text: Igor Yuriyevich Nikulin (; 14 August 1960 – 7 November 2021) was a Russian hammer thrower. He represented the USSR, the Unified Team, and later Russia. He won the bronze medal at the 1992 Summer Olympics in Barcelona, Spain. He was born in Moscow. Nikulin died on 7 November 2021, at the age of 61.Скончался известный метатель молота Игорь Никулин ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Soviet athletes Category:Hammer throwers Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Russia Category:Sportspeople from Moscow
